POS 0 7,4

DLG a
. .. ... // Heat washes across your face. You can feel your skin tighten and split. Voices echo in your ears like sounds from a dream. Perhaps you've always been able to hear these voices, always sensed them lurking at the edge of your consciousness, but now you and they have broken free of the chains of matter and life-- and so has your blood. You retch red in the dirt as the tall being with the high forehead and the long cool fingers approaches you and selects you for a better life. With a voice that crackles and croons like butter on asphalt, it says, "COME -- WALK WITH ME," and you try, you try, you try... But only your leg follows the path. // ... .. .

DLG c
"Multiple lacerations to the scalp and cheeks. Eyes... missing. But that expression... did they die happy?"

DLG h
"Right leg: shredded. Scratches and toothmarks at the end of the femur indicate possible animal attack."

DLG g
"Left arm: missing. Wound totally cauterized. Signs of radiation burns."

DLG f
"Right arm's been snipped off. Wound's too clean for an animal bite. I'm thinking: giant shears?"

DLG e
"Surprisingly: nothing wrong with this leg."

DLG j
"Scurry-- the reason none of this make sense is WE'RE DEALING WITH THE SUPERNATURAL."

DLG i
"Scurry-- the reason none of this make sense is WE'RE DEALING WITH THE SUPERNATURAL."

DLG k
"Molder-- NONE OF THIS MAKES SENSE! There's too much contradictory evidence!"

DLG l
"Molder-- NONE OF THIS MAKES SENSE! There's too much contradictory evidence!"

DLG p
"Deep wounds to the left leg. Extreme blood loss."

DLG q
"I've picked over seven hundred tiny metal fragments out of these bodies. No clue what they're made of. Most are in the trash now."

DLG r
"I broke three scalpels on this guy's skin. None of my tools seems able to cut it."

DLG o
"Is that... a hoof??"

DLG n
"This arm is MUCH TOO LONG."

DLG m
"Head's been smashed in. Heavy blow from a large, blunt object."

DLG s
CRIME LAB

DLG z
"I requisitioned certain supplies from the local HQ. A handheld metal detector. A radiation meter. Three small rats trained to alert in the presence of smallpox virus. None of this has helped."

DLG d
. .. ... // Heat washes across your face. You can feel your skin tighten and split. Voices echo in your ears like sounds from a dream. Perhaps you've always been able to hear these voices, always sensed them lurking at the edge of your consciousness, but now you and they have broken free of the chains of matter and life-- and so has your blood. You retch red in the dirt as the tall being with the high forehead and the long cool fingers approaches you and selects you for a better life. With a voice that crackles and croons like butter on asphalt, it says, "COME -- WALK WITH ME," and you try, you try, you try... But only your leg follows the path. // ... .. .
